input_text:
Job Title: Senior Software Developer

Location: Columbia, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
In a world of possibilities, pursue one with endless opportunities. Imagine Next!

When it comes to what you want in your career, if you can imagine it, you can do it at Parsons. Imagine a career working with intelligent, diverse people sharing a common quest. Imagine a workplace where you can be yourself. Where you can thrive. Where you can find your next, right now. We’ve got what you’re looking for.

Job Description

Parsons has an exciting opportunity for an experienced Software/Web Developer (hybrid opportunity)! We're hiring a talented application developer to spearhead a newly created development team supporting USCYBERCOM in the Columbia, MD and Fort Meade area. A full stack developer (or someone who is well versed in front or backend development and willing to learn the other side) who is ready to design and create applications and architectures in a small, agile team would be the ideal candidate. This position will have complete, end-to-end ownership of a variety of projects in support of establishing a new mission-specific Security Operations Center within USCYBERCOM. The ideal candidate has experience and interest in building products across the stack and a firm understanding of web frameworks, APIs, databases, and multiple back-end languages. Imagine Next with Parsons.

What You'll Be Doing

Define requirements and design applications to support both business processes and data analytic efforts.Developing software and automated tests using Java, Python, and/or JavaScript.Participating in technical discussions to assist in planning future development efforts.Design, build and maintain new web applications for the organization.Design, build and maintain data dashboards.


What Required Skills You'll Bring

ACTIVE TS/SCI with polygraphMinimum Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related discipline10+ years Software Engineering/Development experience including a deep knowledge of programming languages such as Java, C/C++, and/or PythonWorking experience in Windows and Linux environments


What Desired Skills You'll Bring

Development experience with HTML5, CSS3 web standards, and JavascriptExperience working DoD/security development projectsCollaborate with the team to ensure applications align with organizational goals as well as customer needsImprove overall application development process and continuously find ways to opportunities to modernizeExperience working within a Security Operations Center 


Minimum Clearance Required To Start

Top Secret SCI w/Polygraph

This position is part of our Federal Solutions team.

Our Federal Solutions segment delivers resources to our US government customers that ensure the success of missions around the globe. Our diverse, intelligent employees drive the state of the art as they provide services and solutions in the areas of defense, security, intelligence, infrastructure, and environmental. We promote a culture of excellence and close-knit teams that take pride in delivering, protecting, and sustaining our nation's most critical assets, from Earth to cyberspace. Throughout the company, our people are anticipating what’s next to deliver the solutions our customers need now.

Salary Range

$126,600.00 - $227,900.00

The position may require a COVID vaccination or an approved accommodation/exemption for a disability/medical condition or religious belief as required by customer requirements and some cases federal, state, provincial or local mandates.

This position will be posted for a minimum of 3 days and will continue to be posted for an average of 30 days until a qualified applicant is selected or the position has been cancelled.

Parsons is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity, equity, inclusion, and accessibility in the workplace. Diversity is ingrained in who we are, how we do business, and is one of our company’s core values. Parsons equally employs representation at all job levels for minority, female, disabled, protected veteran and LGBTQ+.

We truly invest and care about our employee’s wellbeing and provide endless growth opportunities as the sky is the limit, so aim for the stars! Imagine next and join the Parsons quest—APPLY TODAY!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

job_responsibilities: Designing, building, and maintaining web applications
Designing, building, and maintaining data dashboards
